title: Friendlyy: A Real-Time Chat Application
description: Real-time chat app with PERN stack, Redis caching, and Socket.IO for live communication, featuring secure login and intuitive UI. Integrated Kafka for real-time data streaming and processing.
Utilised WebSockets for real-time communication features in the Friendlyy chat application, enhancing live user interaction.

title: Decentralised Freelance Marketplace
description: Implemented a decentralised freelance marketplace inspired by Fiverr, leveraging blockchain technology to ensure secure, transparent, and fair transactions between freelancers and clients, focusing on creating a full-stack decentralised application (dApp) with Ethereum smart contracts.

title: EventHub
description: Built on Next.js 14, the events application stands as a comprehensive, full-stack platform for managing events. It serves as a hub, spotlighting diverse events taking place globally. Featuring seamless payment processing through Stripe, you have the capability to purchase tickets for any event or even initiate and manage your own events. Implemented SSR and SSG techniques using Next.js, improving load times and SEO performance.

title: Economease: Simplify Your Finances
description: Developed a full-stack financial management platform using MERN stack, integrating machine learning to analyse future returns with a focus on user-friendly design. Implemented AI features using OpenAIâ€™s GPT models to enhance predictive analytics capabilities.

title: Serverless Blog Platform Development
description: AWS Lambda-based blog platform with API Gateway, DynamoDB, IAM, and Serverless Framework for scalable, cost-effective web app deployment and management.

title: Real-Time Automatic Number Plate Recognition
description: Developed a real-time automatic number plate recognition system using machine learning techniques to detect and recognize vehicle licence plates from video streams.

title: Infrastructure Monitoring and Logging System
description: Set up comprehensive monitoring and logging for a multi-server environment using Grafana and Splunk, providing real-time insights and alerts for system performance and security.
